TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Haw-wan-ciw, title = Haw-wan-ciw, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Haw-wan-ciw} }

S.FORM: == Haw-wan-ciw 好望角 == Haw-wan-ciw " kamu nu Nan-huy: Kaap die Goeie Hoop,(ˌkɑːp di ˌχujə 'ɦʊəp), kamu nu He-lan Kaap de Goede Hoop,(ˌkaːb də ˌɣudə 'ɦoːp) , kamu nu Pu-taw-ya:Cabo da Boa Esperança,('kaβu ðɐ 'βoɐ ʃpɨ'ɾɐ̃sɐ)" itida i Hei-cuo nan-hei-kun-he-kuo a nutipan timilan, laad tu amis Kay-pu-tun sipwal km, mitepal tu Ta-si-yen, itida i Kay-pu-pan-daw a tatapangan, Nan-hei u tataydaan nu midangan a kitidaan. itida i Su-yen-se kakaydaan a sauwac caay henay kaydaan, Haw-wan-ciw u O-cuo sakatayda i walian a kakaydaan nu bayuan, katukuh ayda, nu micidekay nu tabakiay a balungaan anu caay picumud i Su-yun-se caculilan nu sauwac, amakayda aca i Haw-wan-ciw. ina Haw-wan-ciw hina kapatelacan nu tademaw u Huy-cuo talu sakatimul sa, milaad tu wali timul pasayda tu walian makaala tu caylimsep kunli, silaad tu Fuo-e-se-wan papangawan a E'-ciw-le-se-ciw kiya tatengaay nu Huy-cuo nu katimulan. yu cun-kuo cin-min-zitay nu malumanay u ngangan " Ta-lang-san". 好望角(南非語:Kaap die Goeie Hoop,(ˌkɑːp di ˌχujə 'ɦʊəp)；荷蘭語:Kaap de Goede Hoop,(ˌkaːb də ˌɣudə 'ɦoːp) ；葡萄牙語:Cabo da Boa Esperança,('kaβu ðɐ 'βoɐ ʃpɨ'ɾɐ̃sɐ)) 48km, "大浪山". Lui't 歷史 caysipwalnem mihcaan, Pu-taw-ya mitahaway tu balungan ci Pa-e-tuo-luo-mei-u.Di-ya-se mitahaway nu tademaw namaka Li-se-pen malingatu, mikilim tu sakatayda i walian " hun-cin-le-tu" a buyuan muculil. ya balungan katukuhsa i Ta-si-yen atu In-tu-yen kalalitemuhan a nanuman, tabaki ku bali atu cakkep, tada tabakitu ku cacek mabelin ku balungan maenep. sadikuday idaw henay ku i baalungaay a maudipay nu tademawan mapacascas taydan i caayay kakatinengan nu ngangan, sisa idaw ku maudipay nu tademawan. sisa pangangan han ni Di-se-ya u " Paw-wan-ciw". saan ci Di-se-ya anu pacicien pacuna mungangew hakiya a makatukuh i In-tu, nika inai'tu ku kakanen, sisa mutikuaca taluma' i Pu-taw-ya. caysipsiwpic mihcaan sabaw cacy a demiad, duma a mitahaway a tademaw ci D.Cia-ma mililid tu balungan makayda i Haw-wan-ciw muculi micumud i In-tu-yen, yadah ku nipitupin tu'kim, dawa pataluma' i Pu-taw-ya. sumad han nu Pu-taw-ya wankuo ese kiya Paw-hung-ciw tu " Haw-wan-ciw" namakayda malaO-cuo tademaw sacudud tu In-tu-yeng nu dadanan. tu mihmihcaan tabakitu ku cakep atu bali nu Haw-wan-ciw, hina idaw ku " mipatayay nu cakepan" a tahekal, mahiniay a cakep saadidiay makaala tu lim—enem a kunce ku nikatalakawan, icelang makaala tu sabaw tu lima a kunce ku talakaw, tatapangan nu cakep mahida u dihep, kulul nu cakep mahida u masikitay nu buyu', makanay nu tademaw caay tu kasausi, u sakatalawan nu mitahaway a pabalungaay nu tademaw. caylimsepsep mihcaan, ci Di-se-ye mutikuaca pasayda i Haw-wan-ciw, kaletepan nu tabakiay a cakepan itida tu a mapatay. 1497年11月, . caynemwalpic mihcaan sabaw tusa bulad tulu a bataan idaw ku cacay a demiad, idaw ku masakaputay ni Hu-ke-nuo-pay tademaw namaka He-lan katukuh i Haw-wan-ciw. sayaway nuheni ku sapiculimek tu Fa-kuo tinsukiw sapiedis saw tu sinzia sa taydan i He-lan ku nipilaliw, alaw katukuh i Haw-wan-ciw. 1687年12月31日, . kalepacawan nu Na-puo-lun henay, He-lan-kun-he-kuo itida i caypicsiwlim mihcaan debungan nu Fa-kuo. sisa Kay-pu-ce-min-ti mala midapuay ku Fa-kuo, malaha hantayan nu fan-fa-tun-mun nu aedisan nu In-kuo. tawya a mihcaan In-kuo midebung tu Kay-pu kakitidaan. caywalseplu mihcaan, alesen nu In-kuo ku sapikuwan, nika i caywalsepnem mihcaan cacay a bulad sabaw siwa dimian ci Pu-law-u-paw kalepacawan tu nikudan malingatu aca midebung tina kitidaan. He-lan-tademaw itida i caywalcaysip mihcaan a Lun-tun-kiyaku tu Kay-pu kitidaan sipikelap pabeli tu In-kuo a tademaw. caysiwcaysep mihcaan, Kay-pu kitidaan pulungen mala Na-huy-len-pan. . aydaay a Haw-wan-ciw bayu inai'tu ku tabakiay nu cakepan, nika idaw ku tabakiay nu calamay, mamiput satu likalikat nu ibayuay a tinhuy. aydatu a mihcaan, misangan aca ku Kay-pu-tun tu micapiay tu dadipasan nu tabakiay a baluhay nu papadikian, ipabaw idaw ku nisulitan tu ina kitidaan atu kitakid nu macimacian a lalaadan. 52 581 Kay-pu-pan-daw " igu: Cape Peninsula" , itida i Nan-huy masapucuay a pandaw. nikudan nina pandaw u tabakiay nu ba'tuan, nganngan han u takal a buyu' " Table Mt." talakaw milakuuyt tu cacay a malebut kuce. Pantaw a kalimucu u kasinganganan a Haw-wan-ciw, cacay a malebut enem a lasubu lima a bataan idaw ku tusa a mihcaan, He-lan tun In-tu kusi a balungn makaadih tina pantawan, itida i Cuo-wan " Table Bay" musaluiemeng itida mutapabaw, malingatu tu Nan-huy a mabulaway nu lui'tan. Kay-pu-tun pantaw idaw ku bangcalay tanayuay a dadipasan, sasasinganganay u Haw-te'-wan, Saw-ni-wan, idaw ku sabaw tusa a tungduh nu buyu' itida i liklik nu dadipasan, sisa pangangan han tu " sabaw tusa a disian a buyu'" i dadipasan nu bayu yadah ku nubayu a gaciw, idaw henay ku nikaadihan tu tusa a malebut enem a lasubuan nu canancanan nu kilangan. Kay-pu-pan-daw a duma nu picidekan a tuudan u tabakiay a ayaman, mikikaka tu kitakid nu pulung tu siwa a bataan a lasubu. Kay-pu-tun pantaw idaw ku nipatideng tu Kay-pu-tun tabakiay a cacudadan. . tataydaan nu aidangan旅遊景點 tataydaan nu aidangan "igu:Tourist attraction", tuda sananay nu aidangan a aidangan, picidekan idaw ku sapatahekal tu hidasananay atu lalangawan nu puc, lui't a nikalalid, hidasananay atu nisangaan tu bangacalay, atu nipaini tu sakalimulan a aaidangan. . canacanan種類 kaakutian nu dadisapan atu lalangaw nu Pa-li-taw patayni tu katuuday a tademaw midang tina Tu-ciw-taw, mahida u dadipasananay a miyuan a nikacaay ka alasias nu demiadan. . pakunida hananay nu aadihan mahida u dadisapan, dihekuay a Tu-ciw-subal, kanatal aidangan, buyu', likelikenan atu kilakilangan u midangay a tademaw atu milisuay a laylay nu aaidangan. tataydaan tu lalangawan a aaidangan. idaw ku tataydaan midang idaw ku nipatucekan mutayda a midang taneng tu namaka kungkuay palatatataydaan midang tu sapalasasiwbayan. pasu mahida i Sin-muo-si-ke-cuo-luo-se-wi-e micapiay a UFO nikahetikan nu hikuki, itida i Su-ke-lan kaadihan tu sidi'tuay nu banaw a Ni-se-banaw. mitahaw tu mahicaay a di'tu palatataydaan nu kapahay a aaidangan. UFO . adidi' ku iluc nu masakaputay atu malaaaidangan, mahida nu Amilikaay a Tang-zin-cia atu In-kuo Lun-tun-pu-li-ke'-se-tun a lumeniay nu In-kuo a niyadu'an. . itini i Amilika, tataydaan midang idaw namin ku payapay mutidengtu i dadadanan atu pacakayay nu misiwbayay, tu tataydaan midang. duma idaw i kunliukiyuk a tataydaan, papatinakuan, kakanen atu kadideng nu liwkangngan atu tabakiay nu papatinakuan a nipabeli tu tataydaan midang nu aadihan tu cudadan. ilabu nu kanatal, mikacaw tu balunga atu basu kanamuhan nu taydaay a midang.

== Haw-wan-ciw 好望角 == Haw-wan-ciw " kamo no Nan-hoy: Kaap die Goeie Hoop,(ˌkɑːp di ˌχojə 'ɦʊəp), kamo no He-lan Kaap de Goede Hoop,(ˌkaːb də ˌɣodə 'ɦoːp) , kamo no Po-taw-ya:Cabo da Boa Esperança,('kaβo ðɐ 'βoɐ ʃpɨ'ɾɐ̃sɐ)" itida i Hei-coo nan-hei-kon-he-koo a notipan timilan, laad to amis Kay-po-ton sipwal km, mitepal to Ta-si-yen, itida i Kay-po-pan-daw a tatapangan, Nan-hei o tataydaan no midangan a kitidaan. itida i So-yen-se kakaydaan a saowac caay henay kaydaan, Haw-wan-ciw o O-coo sakatayda i walian a kakaydaan no bayoan, katokoh ayda, no micidekay no tabakiay a balongaan ano caay picomod i So-yon-se cacolilan no saowac, amakayda aca i Haw-wan-ciw. ina Haw-wan-ciw hina kapatelacan no tademaw o Hoy-coo talo sakatimol sa, milaad to wali timol pasayda to walian makaala to caylimsep konli, silaad to Foo-e-se-wan papangawan a E'-ciw-le-se-ciw kiya tatengaay no Hoy-coo no katimolan. yo con-koo cin-min-zitay no malomanay o ngangan " Ta-lang-san". 好望角(南非語:Kaap die Goeie Hoop,(ˌkɑːp di ˌχojə 'ɦʊəp)；荷蘭語:Kaap de Goede Hoop,(ˌkaːb də ˌɣodə 'ɦoːp) ；葡萄牙語:Cabo da Boa Esperança,('kaβo ðɐ 'βoɐ ʃpɨ'ɾɐ̃sɐ)) 48km, "大浪山". Loi't 歷史 caysipwalnem mihcaan, Po-taw-ya mitahaway to balongan ci Pa-e-too-loo-mei-o.Di-ya-se mitahaway no tademaw namaka Li-se-pen malingato, mikilim to sakatayda i walian " hon-cin-le-to" a boyoan mocolil. ya balongan katokohsa i Ta-si-yen ato In-to-yen kalalitemohan a nanoman, tabaki ko bali ato cakkep, tada tabakito ko cacek mabelin ko balongan maenep. sadikoday idaw henay ko i baalongaay a maodipay no tademawan mapacascas taydan i caayay kakatinengan no ngangan, sisa idaw ko maodipay no tademawan. sisa pangangan han ni Di-se-ya o " Paw-wan-ciw". saan ci Di-se-ya ano pacicien pacona mongangew hakiya a makatokoh i In-to, nika inai'to ko kakanen, sisa motikoaca taloma' i Po-taw-ya. caysipsiwpic mihcaan sabaw cacy a demiad, doma a mitahaway a tademaw ci D.Cia-ma mililid to balongan makayda i Haw-wan-ciw mocoli micomod i In-to-yen, yadah ko nipitopin to'kim, dawa pataloma' i Po-taw-ya. somad han no Po-taw-ya wankoo ese kiya Paw-hong-ciw to " Haw-wan-ciw" namakayda malaO-coo tademaw sacodod to In-to-yeng no dadanan. to mihmihcaan tabakito ko cakep ato bali no Haw-wan-ciw, hina idaw ko " mipatayay no cakepan" a tahekal, mahiniay a cakep saadidiay makaala to lim—enem a konce ko nikatalakawan, icelang makaala to sabaw to lima a konce ko talakaw, tatapangan no cakep mahida o dihep, kolol no cakep mahida o masikitay no boyo', makanay no tademaw caay to kasaosi, o sakatalawan no mitahaway a pabalongaay no tademaw. caylimsepsep mihcaan, ci Di-se-ye motikoaca pasayda i Haw-wan-ciw, kaletepan no tabakiay a cakepan itida to a mapatay. 1497年11月, . caynemwalpic mihcaan sabaw tosa bolad tolo a bataan idaw ko cacay a demiad, idaw ko masakapotay ni Ho-ke-noo-pay tademaw namaka He-lan katokoh i Haw-wan-ciw. sayaway noheni ko sapicolimek to Fa-koo tinsokiw sapiedis saw to sinzia sa taydan i He-lan ko nipilaliw, alaw katokoh i Haw-wan-ciw. 1687年12月31日, . kalepacawan no Na-poo-lon henay, He-lan-kon-he-koo itida i caypicsiwlim mihcaan debongan no Fa-koo. sisa Kay-po-ce-min-ti mala midapoay ko Fa-koo, malaha hantayan no fan-fa-ton-mon no aedisan no In-koo. tawya a mihcaan In-koo midebong to Kay-po kakitidaan. caywalseplo mihcaan, alesen no In-koo ko sapikowan, nika i caywalsepnem mihcaan cacay a bolad sabaw siwa dimian ci Po-law-o-paw kalepacawan to nikodan malingato aca midebong tina kitidaan. He-lan-tademaw itida i caywalcaysip mihcaan a Lon-ton-kiyako to Kay-po kitidaan sipikelap pabeli to In-koo a tademaw. caysiwcaysep mihcaan, Kay-po kitidaan polongen mala Na-hoy-len-pan. . aydaay a Haw-wan-ciw bayo inai'to ko tabakiay no cakepan, nika idaw ko tabakiay no calamay, mamipot sato likalikat no ibayoay a tinhoy. aydato a mihcaan, misangan aca ko Kay-po-ton to micapiay to dadipasan no tabakiay a balohay no papadikian, ipabaw idaw ko nisolitan to ina kitidaan ato kitakid no macimacian a lalaadan. 52 581 Kay-po-pan-daw " igo: Cape Peninsola" , itida i Nan-hoy masapocoay a pandaw. nikodan nina pandaw o tabakiay no ba'toan, nganngan han o takal a boyo' " Table Mt." talakaw milakooyt to cacay a malebot koce. Pantaw a kalimoco o kasinganganan a Haw-wan-ciw, cacay a malebot enem a lasobo lima a bataan idaw ko tosa a mihcaan, He-lan ton In-to kosi a balongn makaadih tina pantawan, itida i Coo-wan " Table Bay" mosaloiemeng itida motapabaw, malingato to Nan-hoy a mabolaway no loi'tan. Kay-po-ton pantaw idaw ko bangcalay tanayoay a dadipasan, sasasinganganay o Haw-te'-wan, Saw-ni-wan, idaw ko sabaw tosa a tongdoh no boyo' itida i liklik no dadipasan, sisa pangangan han to " sabaw tosa a disian a boyo'" i dadipasan no bayo yadah ko nobayo a gaciw, idaw henay ko nikaadihan to tosa a malebot enem a lasoboan no canancanan no kilangan. Kay-po-pan-daw a doma no picidekan a toodan o tabakiay a ayaman, mikikaka to kitakid no polong to siwa a bataan a lasobo. Kay-po-ton pantaw idaw ko nipatideng to Kay-po-ton tabakiay a cacodadan. . tataydaan no aidangan旅遊景點 tataydaan no aidangan "igo:Toorist attraction", toda sananay no aidangan a aidangan, picidekan idaw ko sapatahekal to hidasananay ato lalangawan no poc, loi't a nikalalid, hidasananay ato nisangaan to bangacalay, ato nipaini to sakalimolan a aaidangan. . canacanan種類 kaakotian no dadisapan ato lalangaw no Pa-li-taw patayni to katooday a tademaw midang tina To-ciw-taw, mahida o dadipasananay a miyoan a nikacaay ka alasias no demiadan. . pakonida hananay no aadihan mahida o dadisapan, dihekoay a To-ciw-sobal, kanatal aidangan, boyo', likelikenan ato kilakilangan o midangay a tademaw ato milisoay a laylay no aaidangan. tataydaan to lalangawan a aaidangan. idaw ko tataydaan midang idaw ko nipatocekan motayda a midang taneng to namaka kongkoay palatatataydaan midang to sapalasasiwbayan. paso mahida i Sin-moo-si-ke-coo-loo-se-wi-e micapiay a UFO nikahetikan no hikoki, itida i So-ke-lan kaadihan to sidi'toay no banaw a Ni-se-banaw. mitahaw to mahicaay a di'to palatataydaan no kapahay a aaidangan. UFO . adidi' ko iloc no masakapotay ato malaaaidangan, mahida no Amilikaay a Tang-zin-cia ato In-koo Lon-ton-po-li-ke'-se-ton a lomeniay no In-koo a niyado'an. . itini i Amilika, tataydaan midang idaw namin ko payapay motidengto i dadadanan ato pacakayay no misiwbayay, to tataydaan midang. doma idaw i konliokiyok a tataydaan, papatinakoan, kakanen ato kadideng no liwkangngan ato tabakiay no papatinakoan a nipabeli to tataydaan midang no aadihan to codadan. ilabo no kanatal, mikacaw to balonga ato baso kanamohan no taydaay a midang.
